details.name: ISO 19005-1:2005 - 6.8.4 Natural language specification
details.description: If the Lang entry is present in the document catalog dictionary or in a structure element dictionary or property list, its value shall be a language identifier as defined by RFC 1766, Tags for the Identification of Languages, as described in PDF Reference 9.8.1.
